tpk::WrapControl

tpk::WrapControl Class Reference

#include <WrapControl.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Wrap Control.

A Wrap Control object stores the wrap logic and position type codes for controlling a Rotary Axis object. The codes can have temporary values which revert to the permanent values when they are read.
